content.text:
# IIFA Utsavam Award for Best Actor – Telugu

IIFA Utsavam Award for Best Actor  Telugu is given by the International Indian Film Academy in South Indian segment which is known as IIFA Utsavam as part of annual ceremony for Telugu films, to recognise a male actor who has delivered an outstanding performance in a leading role.
